#summary Firefox使用者注意事項

= 關於廣告移除 =

== Helianthus.Annuus:Rubbish Remover ==

Helianthus.Annuus:Rubbish Remover與Helianthus.Annuus:Main Script為獨立組件,
用戶必須安裝Helianthus.Annuus:Initializer,
但可選擇不安裝Helianthus.Annuus:Main Script.


 # 請先確定已經安裝[http://helianthus-annuus.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/AN_Initializer.user.js Helianthus.Annuus:Initializer], 詳見[HowToInstall 如何安裝Helianthus.Annuus].
 # 點擊[http://helianthus-annuus.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/AN_RubbishRemover.user.js 此處]安裝Helianthus.Annuus:Rubbish Remover.
 # 安裝附加元件[https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1865 Adblock Plus].
 # 重新啟動Firefox.
